dataset_id: ATom: L2 In Situ Measurements from Single Particle Soot Photometer (SP2)
title: ATom: L2 In Situ Measurements from Single Particle Soot Photometer (SP2)
summary: This dataset provides the refractory black carbon mass concentration at one-second resolution measured by the Single Particle Soot Photometer (NOAA SP2) instrument during airborne campaigns conducted by NASA's Atmospheric Tomography (ATom) mission. The SP2 is a laser-induced incandescence instrument primarily used for measuring the black carbon mass content of individual particles.
